title: Google Maps Extractor
description: Extract data from thousands of Google Maps locations and businesses. Our base charge for Google Maps is just $4 per 1,000 places.

location.title: 📍 Location
location.description: City, state, country or specific address where to search

maxResults.title: 💯 Number of places
maxResults.description: Maximum number of places to extract

zoom.title: 🔍 Zoom level
zoom.description: Higher zoom extracts more places but takes exponentially longer. Default zoom is automatically chosen based on location size.

includeReviews.title: 💬 Include reviews ($)
includeReviews.description: Extract customer reviews for each place (additional cost - marked with $ sign)

includeImages.title: 🖼️ Include images ($)
includeImages.description: Extract business photos and images (additional cost - marked with $ sign)

minStars.title: ⭐ Minimum rating
minStars.description: Only extract places with this rating or higher (0-5 stars)

categoryFilter.title: 🏷️ Category filter ($)
categoryFilter.description: Filter results by specific business categories (additional cost - marked with $ sign)

maxCrawledPlacesPerSearch.title: 🚀 Max places per search term
maxCrawledPlacesPerSearch.description: Maximum number of places to crawl for each search term before moving to next area

includePricing.title: 💰 Include pricing info ($)
includePricing.description: Extract price level and cost information when available (additional cost)

includeOpeningHours.title: 🕒 Include opening hours ($)
includeOpeningHours.description: Extract business opening hours and schedule (additional cost)

onlyOpen.title: 🔓 Only open businesses
onlyOpen.description: Only extract businesses that are currently open

excludeChains.title: 🏪 Exclude chain businesses
excludeChains.description: Exclude large chain businesses (McDonald's, Starbucks, etc.)
